answers.answer: My doctor only calls if it comes back positive for gd so you better cross your fingers and toes that your doctor forgets your number lol
Lol Im HoPing So But I Don't Think My Luck Is That Good ):
Well hopefully it was hun just be patient and have hope.
I didn't get a call when I took mine because everything came out good, when I went for my next appointment they told me everything was ok

I would call them if I were you. My dr's nurse "forgot" to call... I took my 3 hour test starting at 8 AM and at 4:30 PM I had finally had enough of wondering so I called and sure enough I had failed the test! I was diagnosed with gestational diabetes

My office doesn't usually call unless it's bad news either, but I'm a worry wart and I call and call and call until they finally tell me to calm the heck down haha they didn't call about,my results and told me that everything was normal at my next visit. Just call, don't be afraid to bug that's what they're there for lol to be bugged by expecting mothers and to to deliver the babies :p
I Called And Passed My 3 Hr Yay!

question: Is No News Good NeWs?? I Was Supposed To Hear Back Today And Haven't Received A Call?? Will They Call Me Regardless Of Results Or Should I Just Assume It's Good News?? I Want To Call Them But Don't Want To BUg :/
title: 3 hr glucose
